Question
========

In the population of psychology students, the variable height has a normal distribution with mean 178.6 cm and standard deviation of 6.0 cm. In a *random sample* of 36 students, what is the probability of finding a mean height that is less than 176.6?

Answerlist
----------

* 0.000
* 0.023
* 0.371

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0.000: Incorrect
* 0.023: Correct
* 0.371: Incorrect
